definitions.text: a baby bed with sides and rockers
where something originated or was nurtured in its early existence

examples: he was taught from the cradle never to cry

definitions.text: a trough that can be rocked back and forth; used by gold miners to shake auriferous earth in water in order to separate the gold

examples: He cradles the child in his arms

definitions.text: hold or place in or as if in a cradle
examples: He cradled the infant in his arms

definitions.text: cut grain with a cradle scythe
